edu.memphis.ccrg.lida.workspace.broadcastqueue
Class BroadcastQueueImpl

java.lang.Object
  edu.memphis.ccrg.lida.framework.LidaModuleImpl
      edu.memphis.ccrg.lida.workspace.broadcastqueue.BroadcastQueueImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
Initializable, LidaModule, ModuleListener, BroadcastListener, BroadcastQueue, WorkspaceBuffer
public class BroadcastQueueImpl
extends LidaModuleImpl
implements BroadcastQueue, BroadcastListener

This implementation stores incoming conscious broadcasts. There is a limit on the queue's capacity.

Author:
Ryan J McCall

Method Detail

receiveBroadcast

public void receiveBroadcast(BroadcastContent bc)
Description copied from interface: BroadcastListener
This method should return as possible in order to no delay the rest of the broadcasting. A good implementation should just store the content in a buffer and return.

Specified by:
receiveBroadcast in interface BroadcastListener
Parameters:
bc - the Content of the Broadcast

Theory says receivers of the broadcast should learn from it.

decayModule

public void decayModule(long ticks)
Description copied from class: LidaModuleImpl
Do not call this method. Decay the module and all the submodules. Subclasses must call this implementation in order to have all submodules decayed.

Specified by:
decayModule in interface LidaModule
Overrides:
decayModule in class LidaModuleImpl
Parameters:
ticks - number of ticks to decay.
